WorkItem.Description:
Hi, I am trying to do the following in a chirpy mash config:

<root>
    <FileGroup Name ="Test.cshtml">
        <File Path="Myproject\views\home\home.cshtml" Minify="false" />
    </FileGroup>
</root>

This works, however the output file is called "Test.css" instead of the intended "Test.cshtml".

I am finding uses for Chirpy outside of its original scope, so I hope this minor issue will be fixed in the next release.

Thanks!

Comments.Message: The latest source contains a fix for this.
